description: A thick, creamy, hearty and delicious Vegan Potato Soup loaded with veggies. Grab a spoon and dig in!
keywords: dairy free potato soup, easy potato soup, homemade potato soup, vegan potato soup
name: Vegan Potato Soup with Kale
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil (use water or broth for an oil-free option)
4 cups diced gold potatoes (peeled (about 5-6 medium size)
1/2 cup frozen corn kernels (or fresh if you have it)
1 cup chopped kale (ribs and stems removed)
1/2 cup unsweetened, plain non-dairy milk (or to taste, optional)
a few dashes sriracha or hot sauce (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil over medium heat in a soup pot on the stove. Sauté the onion, celery, and carrot until the onion is soft and translucent, about 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the garlic, dill, celery salt, salt and pepper and sauté 1 to 2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the potatoes and broth and stir to combine. Increase the heat to high to bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are fork tender.

Using an immersion blender, puree about 1/3 - 1/2 of the soup to create a thick creamy base. (Alternatively, take about 2-3 cups of the soup and purée it in a blender and then return it to the soup pot).
Add the corn and chopped kale, stir to combine, and simmer 5 more minutes to heat through and soften the kale.
Take off heat and add the non-dairy milk, if using.
Serve with a few dashes of sriracha or hot sauce if desired.

video.description: A thick, hearty and delicious potato soup loaded with veggies. It's super creamy, but contains no dairy at all! Grab a spoon and dig in to this Creamy Dairy Free Potato Soup with Kale.
video.name: Creamy Potato Soup
